title: aasai koNDEn
sahitya:
Ashai koNDEn vaNDE unnuDanE nAn Ishan pugazh pADavE



anupallavi



vAsamalaraDi tEn vAri vAri unDu valam vandu valam vandu nalam peravE



caraNam



vAna shuDar maNiyE jnAnak-kaNmaNiyE vasanta malar azhagE

vaNNak-kuyil ishaiyE

mOna malai aruvi gAnam sheyyum vEdamE muttozhil purindiDum cittanE enrOda
